Isis.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: in ancient Egyptian mythology, the most important goddess. She was the goddess of nature and was also the wife and sister of Osiris.
Isis.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a violent terrorist organization that has taken control of large areas of Iraq and Syria. Its members have killed many people in a cruel way and then shown videos of the killings on the internet. ISIS is based an extreme form of Islam, which many Muslims disagree with.
